caption.p: The protective effect of different concentrations of Lignosus rhinocerus (LR) extracts against glutamate-induced toxicity in HT22 cells. Viability of untreated control cells was set at 100%. ( a) Treatment of cells with an LR ethanol extract (LRE) and LRE plus glutamate; ( b) Treatment of cells with LRC and LRC plus glutamate; ( c) Treatment of cells with LRH and LRH plus glutamate. Values are mean Â± SEM of at least three independent runs. Significant differences: ### p < 0.001 vs. control; *** p < 0.001 vs. glutamate alone.
